items.sentence: I think you\'re the one that I\'ve been waiting for for all these years.
Tom wanted Mary to buy him some stamps while she was at the post office.
Tom was hard up for money and said he would take any job he was offered.
We have three adopted children. The younger two are biological brothers.
Tom called the insurance company to report that his car had been stolen.
Tom and Mary have been trying to come up with a solution to the problem.
I was in my room and didn\'t hear what was happening in the living room.
I can tell you that if I were in Tom\'s place, I wouldn\'t go to Boston.
Tom has written several books, but none of them have been published yet.
What does Tom really think of the way we\'ve been handling this problem?
